text: Marvel's The Punisher is an American TV series and the sixth and final Netflix series of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). The series was created by Steve Lightfoot and was on Netflix from November 17, 2017 to January 18, 2019. Jon Bernthal stars in the series as Frank Castle / Punisher, returning from Daredevil. The series was produced by Marvel Television. Bernthal will return as the character in Daredevil: Born Again. == Cast and characters == * Jon Bernthal as Frank Castle / Punisher * Ebon Moss-Bachrach as David Lieberman / Micro * Ben Barnes as Billy Russo / Jigsaw * Amber Rose Revah as Dinah Madani * Daniel Webber as Lewis Wilson * Paul Schulze as William Rawlins III * Jason R. Moore as Curtis Hoyle * Michael Nathanson as Sam Stein * Jaime Ray Newman as Sarah Lieberman * Deborah Ann Woll as Karen Page * Josh Stewart as John Pilgrim * Floriana Lima as Krista Dumont * Giorgia Whigham as Amy Bendix == Episodes == == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series Category:Netflix original series Category:2017 American television series debuts Category:2019 American television series endings Category:Superhero television shows Category:English-language television programs
title: The Punisher (TV series)
